name: 英文（一）

restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Description and Objectives:**

This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Requirements & Grading policy:**

*   **Attendance and Participation  30%**

\# Punctual attendance and active participation are required. Participation also includes teamwork and group projects.

\# If you are habitually late or absent, points will be deducted and you may fail this course.

\# Exceptions are allowed only under emergent circumstances or notification in advance. Please inform me in advance through **EMAIL** if you will not be able to attend the class.

*   **About Me Presentation (Midterm)  20%**

\# Theme: Follow the guidelines from Presentation 1 (p. 49) and Presentation 2 (p. 87). Select one topic as your own presentation topic (my favorite fictional character OR my greatest achievement).

\# Prepare a 2-minute presentation

\# Use visual aids (photos, posters, props, etc.)

*   **Book Talk (Final)  20%**

Choose a book with your reading partner and both of you should read it. Prepare a 5-minute discussion about the book. The discussion could be about your likes/dislikes about the book, how you feel after reading the book, what you have learned from the book, the things/events the book reminds you of, etc. It is strongly suggested that both of you discuss what you are going to talk about in the test and practice beforehand.

*   **Summary Quiz  5%**

The quiz will mainly focus on the reading texts of the units that are covered in the semester. Each group will complete the quiz together.

*   **Unit Reports\*3  15%**

In your unit report, you should include…

1.  a 100-word reflection about the reading material
2.  a 10-word vocabulary/phrase list including each vocabulary’s/phrase’s Chinese meaning, part-of-speech, and an example sentence.

Please turn in your reports through Moodle on time. Late reports or printed reports will not be accepted.

*   **Lexile Test  10%**
